title: Her Last Secret
description: Some secrets you can never tell.Everyone thinks the Thomases are the perfect family: grand London house, gorgeous kids.They don’t know wife Dominique is a paranoid wreck.They don’t know husband Ben is trapped in a web of deceit.They don’t know daughter Ruby lives in fear of the next abusive text.But someone knows all their secrets.Can the lies that bind them tear them apart?A gripping psychological thriller that will have you holding your breath until the very last page. Fans of Behind Closed Doors, Gone Girl and The Girl on the Train will be hooked.
author: Barbara Copperthwaite
